title: Aahaa Kathal Vandhu  Lyrics Valiyavan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Aahaa Kathal Vandhu Song Lyrics
Valiyavan
Singer: KG Ranjith
Lyrics : Na. Muthukumar & Â Viveka

Aahaa Kathal Vandhu
adichi thuvaikka,
adadaa thappi sella nenachen.

Aanaa aasa
onnu manasil kudhikka.
Thaana maattikittu mulichen.

Azhagaale sirichaale
ava kannum rendum pammbaram
adhile poi vilundhaale
thala suththi mayakkam
vandhidum.

Therinjey naan
tholanjey ponen.

Aahaa Kathal Vandhu
adichi thuvaikka,
adadaa thappi sella nenachen.

Aanaa aasa
onnu manasil kudhikka.
Thaana maattikittu mulichen.

Dhevadhai azhagil aval
ratchasa anbil aval
nodiyinil varuvaal
udan maraivaal
minnlae.

kalayin kadhirum aval
kulappidum pudhirum aval
en manakkadhavai thirandhuvidum
jannale

ennoda edhirkaalam
neethaane nill
un nenjil naan vazha
idam undaa sol
ennachu enakku
pudichchaachu kirukku

Therinjey naan
tholanjey ponen.

Aahaa Kathal Vandhu
adichi thuvaikka,
adadaa thappi sella nenachen.

Adikkadi thookkam keda
adithadi nenjil vara
idhu enna valiyaa
illai sugamaa
sollida

mael imai kaaichchal thara
keel imai marundhai thara
un mugavariyayai
maraippadhenna
thandhidu

aaalillaa theevaaga
aaneney naan
angae nee vandhaaley
pizhaippeney vaa

paer theriyaa poove
poi pesum azhage.

Therinjey naan
tholanjey ponen.

Aahaa Kathal Vandhu
adichi thuvaikka,
adadaa thappi sella nenachen.

Azhagaale sirichaale
ava kannum rendum pammbaram
adhile poi vilundhaale
thala suththi mayakkam
vandhidum.

Therinjey naan
tholanjey ponen.
